title: Can only buy items while dead
body:
I'm not sure if anyone else is having this problem but I did in my most recent game.

When starting the game i tried to click on shop and i couldn't, I tried closing all background programs and I still couldn't click on the shop. To ski[ this i pressed P and the shop opened. The buy button was grayed out for everything like it would be if you were out of range for the shop, I tried double clicking and right clicking the item to avoid this but none of them worked. Later in the game I tried to buy items and I could so long as I was dead. This led to me executing myself every time I needed to buy an item.
